name: Quills Quest 2
description:
Quills Quest 2 is an exploration, fighting platformer

Defeat enemies and collect experience to level up your abilities

Assets

16x16 RPG Icons, By Kyrise https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack

Taiga Asset, By Vnitti https://vnitti.itch.io/taiga-asset-pack

Dungeon Assets, By Crowin ZX https://corwin-zx.itch.io/dungeon-tileset

Enemy Assets, By Elthen https://elthen.itch.io

Projectiles, By Kicked-in-Teeth https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/projectiles
